title: Department of Survey & Mines topographical maps of Western Desert Province, Markaz Maryût
creator: Egypt. Maṣlaḥat al-Misāḥah wa-al-Manājim
description: Topographic maps showing areas in the Western Desert Province around Markaz Maryût. The maps were surveyed in 1940, although publication date is listed as 1939.
subject: Western Desert (Egypt) -- Maps
source: From: Department of Survey & Mines topographical maps of Western Desert Province, Markaz Maryût
